headline: Jim Cramer Points Out Mistakes PepsiCo, Inc. (PEP) Might Have Made
summary: We recently published 10 Latest Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed Amidst Market Uncertainty. PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Tuesday was a cracker of a day for PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP)’s shares as they jumped by 5% after activist investor Elliott Management announced a $4 billion stake in the firm. PepsiCo, […]

headline: Morning Movers: United Therapeutics surges after TETON-2 met primary endpoint
summary: Markets reopened after the Labor Day break on softer footing, with futures tied to the major indexes pointing lower. Investors are balancing several pressures at once: gold prices have surged to fresh record highs above $3,550 an ounce, silver has crossed the $40 mark for the first time since 2011, and bond yields are edging toward 5%. The combination signals an intensifying flight to safety even as equity markets wobble. Oil prices have inched higher, with U.S. crude trading near $66 a barrel a

headline: Celsius Holdings Appoints Michael Del Pozzo to the Company’s Board of Directors
summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., September 03, 2025--Celsius Holdings, Inc. today announced that on Thursday, Aug. 28, 2025, its Board appointed Michael Del Pozzo to the company's Board of Directors.

headline: Corporate maneuverings alone can't solve the problem of shifting consumer tastes
